ChunkText: about oiss umbc office of international students and scholars the office of international students and scholars oiss is dedicated to supporting umbcs international student and scholar community. the office offers a variety of programming and services to assist students and scholars in pursuit of their academic, personal, and professional goals.
ContextAfter: immigration advising oiss helps international students and scholars navigate the u.s. visa process and maintain valid immigration status by providing the guidance, knowledge, and necessary resources. community building oiss offers programming designed to help students make important connections within the umbc community. these opportunities for intercultural exchange and mutual understanding enhance the umbc international student experience.
